properties.name: Atlanta
properties.notes:
We'll be at the Taco Mac at the Prado in Sandy Springs, on Roswell Rd, just inside the Perimeter. Look for us in the covered outdoor section after 6:30PM. Double check our FB page in case of any last minute changes.

https://www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintAtlanta/

Hope to see you in person!

properties.name: Auckland
properties.notes:
Please sign up https://forms.gle/bDFEnZv14Z43p7sM9
Bookings close 7pm Sunday 

Thanks!

properties.name: Austin
properties.address: 7010 Easy Wind Drive, Suite 150, Austin, TX 78752
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: This may be our last month at Vigilante. Please be sure to solve the location puzzle next month to ensure you know where we are.
 

We are starting to run into capacity limits with the regular patrons, so we request that you reserve your space for Tuesday. You can do this at the Vigilante website or by calling them. This isn't mandatory, but will ensure your team has seating when you arrive.

properties.name: Bay Area - East Bay
properties.notes: Note that Lovely's is closed on Tuesdays, but we are told that La Santa Torta there will be this month.

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes: We're back at Time Out Market this month. There are indoor and outdoor seating options. Please rsvp (preferrably by Monday!) if you plan to attend so we can print enough sets: https://pp-rsvp.com/CUDHKH

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

We're back at the Louisville Murphy's Tap House! Check with the host stand to get a table / see if we have a reserved section, and come pick up puzzles from us at the Game Control table.

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Yeti (yeti@physics.muni.cz) if you plan to come. If you want a reservation, make one yourself. Thanks!

properties.name: Central NJ
properties.bar: Alchemist and Barrister Restaurant and Pub
properties.notes: Look for people doing puzzles!

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.bar: Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center
properties.notes:
Brazos Tacos @ Barracks Road Shopping Center!

We'll be back at the NEW Brazos Tacos location (where the old Brixx Pizza used to be in the Barracks Road Shopping Center), NOT the Brazos location at the Ix Art Park!

They have nice indoor and outdoor seating (including covered outdoor seating even if the weather isn't perfect). Tacos and alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are now available.

Please RSVP to puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you will definitely or probably attend!

properties.name: Chicago - City
properties.notes: GC will be along the long tables to your left as you face the bar coming in from the entrance

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.address: 3403 N Damen Ave, City North, IL 60657
properties.notes: Please RSVP at https://pp-rsvp.com/7C85A6 so we know how many to print!  Looking forward to another fun month of puzzles!

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes:
This time we're meeting at BEERS by Bacon Brothers :D

Please book your table on their website, and specify you're with Puzzled Pint.

See you on Tuesday night!

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.address: 8872 McGaw Road, Suite A, Columbia , MD 21045
properties.notes: Looking forward to seeing everyone!

properties.name: Columbus
properties.notes: Steve is out of town, but Todd will have puzzle papers in the little library-like room right behind the welcome desk as you walk in.

properties.name: Coventry
properties.address: Medieval Spon Street, Coventry, COV CV1 3BA
properties.notes: Look for our Puzzled Pint Game Control sign.

properties.name: Denver
properties.address: 2190 S. Platte River Drive, Denver, CO 80223
properties.notes: Please email denverpuzzledpint@gmail.com to rsvp!

properties.name: Edinburgh
properties.address: 72 North Fort Street, Edinburgh, EDH EH6 4HL
properties.notes:
The trams now (finally) run all the way to Newhaven! What better way to celebrate than by catching one to the Dreadnought?

Please have one person from your group send a quick RSVP to PuzzPintEdi@protonmail.com so we can get an idea of numbers and print enough puzzles.

properties.name: Galway City
properties.address: 3 William Street West, H91 V184, G

properties.name: Houston
properties.notes: Find us in the indoor bar/restaurant.

properties.name: Huntsville
properties.address: 3200 Leeman Ferry Rd SW, Huntsville, AL 35801
properties.notes:
We are sharing the bar with another goup but we will have the private room dedicated for us. You are welcome to sit elsewhere as well if you can find a seat!

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV or Twitter: https://twitter.com/PuzzPintHSV

properties.name: Jersey City/Hoboken
properties.notes: We're back in Hoboken this month! Right off the path, we'll be at Texas Arizona starting at 630 PM.

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: At the time of submitting this, it looks like a shaded patio would be a good place to puzzle so we will be doing it at KC Bier Co.  Looks like they close at 9:00 on Tuesdays.  I'll post on our facebook where we are sitting.  https://www.facebook.com/puzzledpintkc

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes: RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print!

properties.name: Leeds
properties.notes:
We're excited to return to in-person puzzling after a couple of years of covid related online activities.

Come and join us!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.notes:
Whole Foods has free underground parking.

We'll be in the bar, which has both indoor and outdoor seating.

properties.name: Madison
properties.notes: RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
This month we are back at Sandbar Manchester, just off Oxford Road near Manchester Met Uni.

It's a beautiful independent pub with a great range of drinks, and fantastic pizzas!

As always - come in a team and start anytime from 7, or come solo before 7.30pm and we will find you a group.

See you there xxx

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
We may be seated upstairs.

Please RSVP here so we know how many puzzles to print: https://pp-rsvp.com/55D34G

Please give us some feedback on our past venues, we'll put the favourites into higher rotation: https://forms.gle/JVYWBTDQZxtSpN5B8

Need help remembering Puzzled Pint each month? Click here to add a recurring event to your Google calendar

properties.name: Missoula
properties.notes: Join us for Taco Tuesday from 6-9 pm!

properties.name: Montreal
properties.address: 5101 St Laurent Blvd, Montreal, QC H2T 1R9
properties.notes: Please RSVP here if you can: https://facebook.com/events/s/puzzled-pint-montreal-christma/949473729598463/

properties.name: New York City
properties.address: 300 W 40th St, New York City, NY 10018
properties.notes: Back at Beer Authority this month.  We are hoping to have some covered outdoor seating available again if you're into it, but will be upstairs regardless!

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on  01603 464461 if you want to book a table and message us either on Facebook or email to let us know you're coming. We'll need to know how many puzzles to print.

properties.name: Orange County
properties.address: 2948 Randolph Av C, Costa Mesa, CA 92626
properties.notes:
We will be in Costa Mesa at Salty Bear Brewing this month!

We are starting at our earlier 6:00 P.M. time.

There is no food at the brewery itself, but there is plenty of food in The Camp next door.

Please RSVP here:
https://pp-rsvp.com/AQSFW3

See you soon!

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.notes:
Ho ho ho! Put on your best summer Christmas outfits! 

Please let us know you're coming by getting free tickets on eventbrite  - it helps us know how many puzzles to print!

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Oxford
properties.notes: Not sure exactly where we'll be in the pub this month.  Look out for our sign!

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: We have a private room in the back (past the bar).  Check in with the host and they will take you back (or point the way).  Elfin attire is encouraged.

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.notes:
Hello Phoenix Puzzlers.

Please don't forget a pencil / pen, and/or anything else you might find helpful (this is not a hint).  See ya there!!  Bring friends!

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes: Join us at Federal Gallery! Nearby street parking is free after 6pm. Buses that come nearby: 1, 2, 4, 6, 7, 11, 12, 13, 15, 16, 17, 54. Cyclists get high fives!

properties.name: Prague
properties.address: Riegrovy sady 28, Prague, Praha, Hlavní město 12000

properties.name: Sacramento
properties.notes:
SacYard has All-day Happy Hour on Tuesdays the and Bahay Kubo food truck will be there.

Please RSVP on Meetup so we know how many puzzle sets to print. https://meetu.ps/e/MdDHJ/VtV2f/i 

Try to arrive by 6:30pm if you would like help finding a team.

There will be a group of runners finishing the Fleet Feet Fun Run around 7pm, so try to get your beer and food before that if you want to avoid the rush!

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.notes: Looking forward to another fun night of puzzles with food and friends and perhaps a pint or two!  Please RSVP (one per team) to the monthly Facebook event OR email me at r_becker@sbcglobal.net (subject: "We're coming to PP")

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes: Come out and do some cool brain teaser puzzles!  It's family friendly though the puzzles can be hard (we are there to help!)

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and please leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: Look for the Puzzled Pint table tent to pick up puzzles for your team - Game Control will be available with puzzles and hints from 6-9PM!  I will plan to sit in the market near Juice + Flowers, but if that changes I will post an update.

properties.name: Tacoma
properties.notes: Venue is 21+ only.

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, July 11, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.notes: We're looking forward to seeing you at Hop the Giffin, a brewpub just off 71st and Yale. Game Control will be there from 6:00-9:00 to provide puzzles and hints. Look for the Puzzled Pint table topper. This location has a food menu if you want to eat dinner while you're there. We can't wait to see you!

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
You can get some cider at Number 12 and some food from the pizza truck in residence, Little Tomato. There is a biggish patio and dogs are welcome outdoors 🐶. We will overlap with darts league and cornhole league at the beginning, so the indoors may have more available seating at the outset. 

Please RSVP here by Monday at midnight so we can print a packet for your team: https://pp-rsvp.com/DMU75D

You can park a car for free in the big lot shown on this map. You can park a bike for free on the bike rack right by the entrance to the patio. For public transit, Number 12 is right by Target Field Station on the Blue Line. 

Reminder to please RSVP: https://pp-rsvp.com/DMU75D 🎉🎉

properties.name: Valencia
properties.address: Carrer del Dr. Ferran, 10, Valencia, V 46021
properties.notes:
Join the group on Telegram to stay up to date: https://t.me/puzzledpintvlc 

Arrive by 2030 if you want to be placed in a team or arrive at any time before 2130 if you have your own team. We will be there until midnight. The puzzles usually take our teams around 2 hours to complete. Not a problem to come alone, you can complete the puzzles alone or we can help you find a team if you would like one. Ask for the Puzzled Pint and/or the Board Games group. We will occupy both 'sides' of the bar.

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
The Moon Under Water loves us when can tell them a headcount, if possiblle, please RSVP per team to chris@enigmaticevents.com.  Also please email us if you'd like to be  on to our reminder email list.

We will have one side of the bar reserved for us until about 7.15.  Look for the Yellow table sign for the puzzle packs!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes: Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back once again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.notes:
Hello Puzzlers! We're at a new venue this month - the Shady Lady on Courtenay Place.

Please make sure that ONE team member RSVPs for you here - https://pp-rsvp.com/T7X2JF

No special stationery required this month, see you Tuesday!

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital). Weather permitting we'll be outside on the terrace – see you there!
